prompts: Create a majestic dragon-like Pokemon that embodies both fire and ice elements.
Imagine a legendary Pokemon with shimmering white scales and striking blue accents.
Generate a mythical creature that has powerful wings and a sleek, serpentine body.
Show me a fire-type Pokemon that resembles a dragon, with elegant features and glowing eyes.
Design a unique Pokemon that combines elements of fire and dragon types, showcasing incredible power.
Give me an image of a legendary Pokemon soaring through the clouds, radiating fiery energy.
Make a Pokemon that stands tall with a graceful yet intimidating presence, featuring breathtaking wings.
